Changes
-------

1.0.5 - 2008/5/5

- update unit tests to no longer require manual intervention to create repository

- turn readme into a real doc test.

- fixes for the tree iterator apis.

1.0.4 - 2008/2/3

- update install_requires, transaction module is now separate from
  the zodb!

0.9.6 - 2006/8/7 

- First Pypi Release
